maqras.text: velev beseta-llahu-rrizka li`ibadihi lebegav fi-l'ardi velakiy yunezzilu bikaderim ma yesa'. innehu bi`ibadihi habirum besir
vehuve-llezi yunezzilu-lgayse mim ba`di ma kanetu veyensuru rahmeteh. vehuve-lveliyyu-lhamid
vemin ayatihi halku-ssemavati vel'ardi vema besse fihima min dabbeh. vehuve `ala cem`ihim iza yesau kadir
vema esabekum mim musibetin febima kesebet eydikum veya`fu `an kesir
vema entum bimu`cizine fi-l'ard. vema lekum min duni-llahi miv veliyyiv vela nesir
vemin ayatihi-lcevari fi-lbahri kel'a`lam
iy yese' yuskini-rriha feyazlelne ravakide `ala zahrih. inne fi zalike leayatil likulli sabbarin sekur
ev yubikhunne bima kesebu veya`fu `an kesir
veya`leme-llezine yucadilune fi ayatina. ma lehum mim mehis
fema utitum min sey'in femeta`u-lhayati-ddunya. vema `inde-llahi hayruv veebka lillezine amenu ve`ala rabbihim yetevekkelun
vellezine yectenibune kebaira-l'ismi velfevahise veiza ma gadibu hum yagfirun
vellezine-stecabu lirabbihim veekamu-ssalah. veemruhum sura beynehum. vemimma razaknahum yunfikun
vellezine iza esabehumu-lbagyu hum yentesirun
vecezau seyyietin seyyietum misluha. femen `afa veasleha feecruhu `ale-llah. innehu la yuhibbu-zzalimin
velemeni-ntesara ba`de zulmihi feulaike ma `aleyhim min sebil
inneme-ssebilu `ale-llezine yazlimune-nnase veyebgune fi-l'ardi bigayri-lhakk. ulaike lehum `azabun elim
velemen sabera vegafera inne zalike lemin `azmi-l'umur
vemey yudlili-llahu fema lehu miv veliyyim mim ba`dih. vetera-zzalimine lemma raevu-l`azabe yekulune hel ila meraddim min sebil

veterahum yu`radune `aleyha hasi`ine mine-zzulli yenzurune min tarfin hafiyy. vekale-llezine amenu inne-lhasirine-llezine hasiru enfusehum veehlihim yevme-lkiyameh. ela inne-zzalimine fi `azabim mukim
vema kane lehum min evliyae yensurunehum min duni-llah. vemey yudlili-llahu fema lehu min sebil
istecibu lirabbikum min kabli ey ye'tiye yevmul la meradde lehu mine-llah. ma lekum mim melceiy yevmeiziv vema lekum min nekir
fein a`radu fema erselnake `aleyhim hafiza. in `aleyke ille-lbelag. veinna iza ezakne-l'insane minna rahmeten feriha biha. vein tusibhum seyyietum bima kaddemet eydihim feinne-l'insane kefur
lillahi mulku-ssemavati vel'ard. yahluku ma yesa'. yehebu limey yesau inasev veyehebu limey yesau-zzukura
ev yuzevvicuhum zukranev veinasa. veyec`alu mey yesau `akima. innehu `alimun kadir
